title: Are the 1970s the late or mid-20th century? - Quora

response.answer_text: The 20th century are divided as follows: Early: 1901–1940 Mid: 1941–1970 Late: 1971–2000 The 70s is therefore under the late 20th century. Note that I’m using the ordinal counting system since that’s what being applied to centuries and millennia. 2000 is the last year of the 20th century.
